alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Hamilton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 5:58PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Bradley and southeastern Hamilton Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 658 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of South Cleveland, or 8 miles west of Cleveland, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, South Cleveland, Wildwood Lake, Collegedale, McDonald, Red Clay State Park, Flint Springs, Apison, Ooltewah and Harrison Bay State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
